definition: having a bright orange-brown color, especially hair or fur, liveliness and energy, add ginger to in order to add flavor
details:
adjective
- having a bright orange-brown color, especially hair or fur
= example: having a bright orange-brown color, especially hair or fur
= synonyms: gingery
noun
- liveliness and energy
= synonyms: pep, peppiness
- pungent rhizome of the common ginger plant
= synonyms: gingerroot
- dried ground gingerroot
= synonyms: powdered ginger
- perennial plants having thick branching aromatic rhizomes and leafy reedlike stems
verb
- add ginger to in order to add flavor
= example: add ginger to in order to add flavor
